https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/mNeddbG0vgRNPZbLxWLkXNGJ28Z.jpg A feature documentary about opera singer Tiriki Onus who finds a 70-year-old silent film believed to be made by his grandfather, Aboriginal leader and filmmaker Bill Onus. As Tiriki travels across the continent and pieces together clues to the filmâ€™s origins, he discovers more about Bill, his fight for Aboriginal rights and the price he paid for speaking out. Ablaze
